channel.title: How do I make an auto dropper?
channel.description: Im power mining and its annoying to drop the ores lol..lazy I know but whats a script for that?....Please and ty.

item.title: How do I make an auto dropper?
item.dc:creator: @oliver1205 oliver1205
item.description:
@oliver1205 wrote:

heres a quick one. beware it isnt to good, but gets the job done.
When your done dropping, use ctrl+alt+s to stop it if it doesnt stop itself.


program dropper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

procedure Drop;
 begin
   DropAll;
 end;


begin
Drop;
end.

This will drop all items in your inventory, use it if you wield pick. if your pick in your inventory have it in first slot. change dropall to drop(2,28)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make an auto dropper?

item.title: How do I make an auto dropper?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You can use a simple Drop(ItemSpot); to drop one, DropTo(ItemSpotStart, ItemSpotStop); to drop multiple things or DropAll; to drop all inventory.

Read full topic
